text: The women's team épée competition at the 2014 Asian Games in Goyang was held on 25 September at the Goyang Gymnasium. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=3|Thursday, 25 September 2014 || 09:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 10:30 || Semifinals |- | 18:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Gold medal match |} ==Seeding== The teams were seeded taking into account the results achieved by competitors representing each team in the individual event. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !rowspan=2 width=40|Rank !rowspan=2 width=250|Team !colspan=2|Fencer !rowspan=2 width=40|Total |- !width=40|1 !width=40|2 |- |1||align=left| ||2||3||5 |- |2||align=left| ||3||7||10 |- |3||align=left| ||1||12||13 |- |4||align=left| ||8||13||21 |- |4||align=left| ||10||11||21 |- |6||align=left| ||6||16||22 |- |7||align=left| ||9||14||23 |- |8||align=left| ||17||21||38 |} ==Results== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team |- | |align=left| Hao Jialu Sun Yiwen Sun Yujie Xu Anqi |- | |align=left| Choi Eun-sook Choi In-jeong Kim Myoung-sun Shin A-lam |- | |align=left| Rie Ohashi Ayaka Shimookawa Ayumi Yamada |- | |align=left| Chu Ka Mong Vivian Kong Coco Lin Yeung Chui Ling |- |5||align=left| Assel Alibekova Ulyana Balaganskaya Jamilya Yunusbayeva Yanina Zakharova |- |6||align=left| Goh Wan Qi Cheryl Lim Elizabeth Lim Victoria Lim |- |7||align=left| Chang Chia-ling Cheng Ya-wen Hsu Jo-ting Tseng Hsiu-hui |- |8||align=left| Wadha Al-Abdulla Aisha Al-Musalmani Fatma Al-Julandani Fatima Hammad |} ==References== *Women's Team Epée Results ==External links== *Official website Women Epee
title: Fencing at the 2014 Asian Games – Women's team épée
